title: Dock workers
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Two figures: one man wearing green vest stands, has a grappling hook in his right hand, the other, with red vest, sits, with right arm over two bags inscribed (in Russian) "Rosto"; irregular shaped base.
name: Figure
